Class ThreadCheckArray

java.lang.Object
ThreadCheckArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ThreadCheckArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
an Runnable class to work in the program With thread in each instance of this class
Version:
2.0v
Author:
Ruslan Abed elrahman

  • Method Details

    • rec

      void rec​(int n, int b)
      an recurcie function that imlpement an dynamic program , we can chosse the number in the array or not .. if we chose the number we send to the next function with out this number ....
      Parameters:
      n - array size
      b - the sum with out the number ( if we chosse to go with this number )
